name: Hair Dryer, Blow Dryer with Diffuser for Curly Hair | Plasma Ionic Hairdryer for Frizz Control | Low Noise | Foldable for Travel | 6.5Ft ALCI Cord | Magnetic Nozzle for Faster Drying
short_description: 110,000 RPM High-Speed Motor & 1500W Power - Powered by a professional-grade 110,000 RPM motor and 1500W output, this hair dryer generates a concentrated 25 m/s airflow to dry hair significantly faster than conventional dryers. Strong airflow shortens drying time while helping maintain natural shine and moisture balance

Plasma Ionic Technology for Frizz Control & Shine - Advanced plasma ionic technology releases high-density ions that penetrate deeper than standard negative ions, helping reduce static, tame frizz, and smooth the hair surface. Enjoy softer, shinier, and more manageable hair after every blow-dry, especially beneficial for curly and textured hair.

Custom Heat Control with Cool & Auto Cycling Modes - Designed for all hair types, the dryer features 3 adjustable heat levels, an instant Cool Shot, and an Auto Temperature Cycling mode that alternates warm and cool airflow. This intelligent heat control helps minimize heat damage while delivering consistent, comfortable drying.

Low-Noise, Foldable & Travel-Friendly Design - Engineered with optimized airflow and acoustic tuning, this blow dryer delivers powerful performance with noticeably reduced noise. The lightweight, foldable body (approx. 0.8 lb / dryer only) fits easily into luggage, while the 6.5 ft long power cord offers flexible reach for home or travel use.

Magnetic Attachments & Easy-Clean Rear Intake - Includes magnetic styling attachments, such as a diffuser and concentrator, for quick changes and precise styling. The enlarged rear air inlet supports stable airflow, and the detachable rear cover allows for fast, hassle-free cleaning—helping maintain consistent performance over time.

Advanced Negative Ion Technology: The ionic hair dryer with diffuser releases 500 million /cm³ of negative ions during the blow drying process, which can neutralise static electricity on the surface of your hair to reduce frizz, but also effectively lock in moisture, nourish your hair, make your hair soft, fluffy and stylish, and give your hair a healthy and natural shine.

Additionally, the professional hair dryer for women adopts professional air duct design and excellent sound insulation technology, with a noise value of only 59db, so you won't disturb others when you use it.

Lightweight & Portable: The lightweight travel hair dryer weighs only 0.97 lbs/440g, small and portable, saving 50% of space in your luggage for more essential items.
